attributes.action: Put a fair cap on lenders Apr rates, example quick quid 1295% Apr is criminal
attributes.additional_details:
Quick quid Representative Example: Amount of credit: £200 for 28 days. One total repayment of £244.80. Interest: £44.80. Interest rate: 292% pa (fixed). 1294.1% APR Representative.

Sunny Representative Example: Loan amount £250 repayable over 6 months. Total amount repayable £469.65 in 6 payments of £78.28. Interest 263% p.a. fixed. Representative 979% APR

Wonga Representative example
Borrow: £100 for 13 days. Interest rate: 292%pa (fixed).One repayment of: £110.40. Representative 1,509% APR.
attributes.background: High lender rates have been the cause of financial problems and it's time to put a stop to this, working families at some point struggle and look to lenders for help, these lenders make things worse higher payments and extreme repercussions for missed payments! Let's cap these rates and make it fair

rejection.details:
There is already a cap on high-cost, short-term credit (often known as payday loans). You can find out more about this here:

https://www.the-fca.org.uk/firms/price-cap-high-cost-short-term-credit
